description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can mimic and amplify your natural glow. When you use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.H45V2aK9vtih4jbz]{beguiling glow} while your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{cloud array} is active, your beguiling glow emanates from all the spaces your cloud array fills, as well as from you. You can use one @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{nanite surge} when you activate beguiling glow to increase the radius of your beguiling glow to 30 feet and change its DC to that of your nanocyte knacks. You must have the beguiling glow species trait and the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.VjS8fKIHpj4Mq2kn]{glimmering nanites} knack to select this nanocyte knack.
